name: Pew Paw
description:
All you have is an old machine gun and a little dog.
Find the parts and craft the most powerful machine gun in the game.
Stroke the dog and try to survive in the world of the zombie apocalypse,
where the map is generated randomly each time.
Challenge the Death and fight the damned dead!

Features:
* 100+ items for crafting.
* Find the best armor and survive as long as possible.
* Hunt bosses and get a reward for their head.
* Destroy the cemetery and summon the Death.
* Find secrets and bonuses in a randomly generated world.
